Text: I will be uploading more Nancy Drew. But I had to re-format my computer long ago and I forget the name of the program that was used to make the torrents. LoL

hey Im a bit thick and i was wondering what i have to do once i have unzipped this file??
Sorry new to downloading games. I have unzipped the file can anyone tell me how I open all the files to play the game?
keep getting error message 'incorrect path to INI file' when trying to load game to play.  Any help with this would be appreciated.
help! i always get the incorrect path to INI something. can somebody please help? i really spent a lot of time downloading the game. i hope i can enjoy it..

You are getting the errors because you're installing the game in the wrong place.

By default, when installing these games, they are put just in the C:/ drive.

Uninstall the games then reinstall them, but this time, change the destination folder to C:/Program Files/Nancy Drew

If you do not have a Nancy Drew folder, create one.
The problem I am having after installing is that if I quit and want to play later it tells me to insert Disk 1, anyway to get around this? Thanks
Thanks Grim I saw your post.

I still don't get what to do ..
I get the "incorrect path to INI file" , tried placing the game in the C:/Program Files/Nancy Drew , exept my computer says that there is no such map :/ im lost , please help !

someonewithaname-
I had this problem too with the older games since I am running windows 7.  This problem tends to pop up for those who are using vista or 7.  What you need to do is go into your documents file and create a folder with what ever you wish to call it.  I prefer the name of the game that is going in it.  Once done, run the setup untill it gives you the option to browse for where to instal it.  Go through your directories till you find the file you created and install it there.  It's worked for me on a number of the older games.  Hope this helps. :)

tellmebob-
I have Vista and it worked! Thank you so much! :-D
